name: Neo-Tokyo Central
subtitle: Corporate Megacity
description: The heart of the corporate empire, where towering skyscrapers pierce the smog-filled sky and neon lights never sleep. This sprawling metropolis serves as the command center for the world's most powerful corporations.

name: Neo-Tokyo Outskirts
subtitle: Abandoned Districts
description: Once thriving residential areas, now abandoned and left to decay. These districts have become havens for rebels, outcasts, and those who refuse to bow to corporate rule.

name: Industrial Zone 7
subtitle: Manufacturing Complex
description: A massive industrial complex where automated factories work around the clock. The air is thick with chemical fumes and the constant hum of machinery echoes through the metal corridors.

name: Wasteland Expanse
subtitle: Irradiated Badlands
description: A vast expanse of irradiated wasteland stretching beyond the horizon. Mutated creatures roam these desolate lands, and strange phenomena occur where reality itself seems unstable.

name: Mining Station Beta
subtitle: Deep Core Extraction
description: A heavily fortified mining operation that extracts rare minerals from deep within the earth. The station operates in shifts, with workers descending into dangerous tunnels that seem to go on forever.

name: Frontier Settlement
subtitle: Last Outpost
description: The last bastion of civilization at the edge of the known world. This hardy settlement serves as a trading post for explorers, researchers, and anyone brave enough to venture into the unknown territories.
